description: This is a Request for supply arrangement - Roads and Grounds Contractor Service.  This notice is issued for the update of the Bidders List amoung entries in the GST/HST Pool.
full_summary:
Parks Canada is soliciting the services of a General Contractor for the management of various multi-disciplinary projects within Prince Edward Island that include construction, alteration, or repair of roads, landscaping services, transportation of heavy equipment, and labor.

Details of the Request for Supply Arrangement:

* The value of contracts resulting from this arrangement will typically range between $5,000 to $100,000 (inclusive of applicable taxes).
* The Supply Arrangement will be valid for one year from the contract award date, with the option for a two-year extension.
* There are no security requirements applicable to this Supply Arrangement.

Update and Response Information:

* Updates will be available on the Government of Canada's procurement service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
* Bidders must submit their interest in this opportunity by sending an email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca). Please do not contact the Contracting Authority via other email addresses.
* Bidders are responsible for accessing and downloading the Request for Supply Arrangement documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service.
* Submission requirements:

  * Bidders must submit their bid via email (at the above address) or via fax (1-855-983-1808).
  * Emails should not exceed 15 MB in total size.
  * Attachments must be sent in either English or French.
  * Links to bid documents will not be accepted.

Evaluation Criteria:
The evaluation criteria for this opportunity were not specified in the provided text. However, the evaluation criteria will be determined at the time of bid solicitation under the Supply Arrangement.

COMPLETE AND FINAL SUBMISSION
If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your request to participate as per the above update and response information (email address and fax number).
